meanings.sent1: Her nonactions led to missed opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The nonactions of the committee resulted in no progress being made.
meanings.sent3: His nonactions in the face of danger were quite puzzling.
meanings.sent4: The nonactions of the government spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of her nonactions were severe.

meanings.sent1: The nonactions in the park made it seem deserted.
meanings.sent2: The nonactions of the machinery indicated a problem.
meanings.sent3: The nonactions of the clock were oddly comforting.
meanings.sent4: The nonactions of the river gave it a serene appearance.
meanings.sent5: The nonactions of the street added to the peaceful atmosphere.
